data.title: J-Cover Lover - Cover Me!
data.meta_description: Collection of Japanese cover songs, not just in Japanese but other languages too.
data.text:
来日するぞ～！

Woohoo! I'm going to Japan for New Year's! Yay! I haven't been back in 6 years!

I can't wait; I'm going to eat, drink, take lots of pics, and oh yeah... BUY COVER CDS!!! YES! No shipping charges!!!!! YAYY!!!!

I know I've been quite neglectful of the blog as of late, but I'm really looking forward to buying up a lot of rare stuff and sharing with you!

I can't wait to see what I find over there! I plan on hitting up some used book/CD stores as well, to add to my 70s 80s collection.

Namida-bashi Gakuen Joshi COVER-bu (泪橋学園女子カバー部) - IDOL retsuden!! COVER 48~Bishojo Jidai (アイドル列伝!!カバー48～美少女時代 NON STOP MIX)

Hey guys! Here's a big Non-stop Idol cover album to tide you over! ^_^

Starting in the early 70s and up to today, idol hits with names you'll recognize!

My only gripe is that they didn't have Iwasaki Hiromi (she had tons of #1 hits in the mid 70s!!! What gives!?) and Okada Yukiko (you gotta respect Yukiko). Other than that, pretty decent selection... it's an alright ensemble if you imagine trying to cram 30 years into a non-stop mix.

I have NO idea who the group is... they have another cover album out and I'll try to get it. But not much info on them out there...

1. 17才 (juu-nana sai) [Seventeen] - Minami Saori (南 沙織) cover

2. ひなげしの花 (hinageshi no hana) [Poppy Flower] - Agnes Chan (アグネス・チャン) cover

3. 赤い風船 (akai fuusen) [Red Balloon] - Asada Miyoko (浅田美代子) cover

4. わたしの彼は左きき (watashi no kare ha hidari-kiki) [My Boyfriend's Left-handed] - Asaoka Megumi (麻丘めぐみ) cover

5. ひと夏の経験 (hito-natsu no keiken) [One Summer's Experience] - Yamaguchi Momoe (山口百恵) cover

6. ハートのエースが出てこない (HEART no ACE ga detekonai) [Not Playing the Ace of Hearts] - Candies (キャンディーズ) cover

7. ペッパー警部 (PEPPER keibu) [Inspector Pepper] - Pink Lady (ピンク・レディー) cover

8. 夏のお嬢さん (natsu no ojou-san) [Summer Lady] - Sakakibara Ikue (榊原郁恵) cover

9. 青い珊瑚礁 (aoi sangosho) [Blue Reef] - Matsuda Seiko (松田聖子) cover

10. ハロー・グッドバイ (HELLO GOODBYE) - Kashiwabara Yoshie (柏原よしえ) cover

11. センチメンタル・ジャーニー (SENTIMENTAL JOURNEY) - Matsumoto Iyo (松本伊代) cover

12. セーラー服と機関銃 (SAILOR fuku to kikanjuu) [Sailor Uniform and Machine Gun] - Yakushimaru Hiroko (薬師丸ひろ子) cover

13. 夏色のナンシー (natsu-iro no NANCY) [Summer Colored Nancy] - Hayami Yuu (早見 優) cover

14. エスカレーション (ESCALATION) - Kawai Naoko (河合奈保子) cover

15. 飾りじゃないのよ涙は (kazari janai no yo namida wa) [Tears Aren't For Decoration] - Nakamori Akina (中森明菜) cover

16. 卒業 (sotsugyou) [Graduation] - Saitou Yuki (斉藤由貴) cover

17. タッチ (TOUCH) - Iwasaki Yoshimi (岩崎良美) cover

18. Bye-Byeガール (Bye-Bye GIRL) - Shojo-tai (少女隊) cover

19. もう逢えないかもしれない (mou aenai kamoshirenai) [We May Never Meet Again] - Kikuchi Momoko (菊池桃子) cover

21. Oneway Generation - Honda Minako (本田美奈子) cover

22. かしこ (kashiko) [Sincerely Yours] - Ushiro Yubi Sasare-gumi (うしろゆびさされ組) cover

23. I Don't Know! - BaBe cover

24. 時の河を越えて (toki no kawa wo koete) [Cross the River of Time] - Ushiro Kami Hikare-tai (うしろ髪ひかれ隊) cover

39. ミニモニ。ジャンケンぴょん! (MINIMONI JYANKEN-pyon!) [Minimoni Jyanken-hop!) - Mini Moni (ミニモニ。) cover

40. 愛のバカやろう (ai no BAKAyarou) [Bastard of Love] - Gotou Maki (後藤真希) cover

41. しょうちのすけ (shouchinosuke) [Yessir] - Suitei Shojo (推定少女) cover

42. Yeah! めっちゃホリディ (...meccha HOLIDAY) [...Really Holiday] - Matsuura Aya (松浦亜弥) cover

Enjoy!!!!

Idol Retsuden

Lumiere - diary ~futsuu no ichi-nichi~ (～フツウの一日～)

Hey guys! So sorry for no updates! I've gotten so lazy with my blogs. I will try to make a schedule for myself (plus I am buying a lot of new cover albums!), so I can keep on uploading regularly!

Here is Lumiere's first full cover album, "diary ~A Normal Day~". I can't figure out from their current website if it is one person or a group, but from this cover, I think they were a trio... because in their second album a girl is gone from the pic (and the singer sounds drastically different). So maybe by now it has wittled down to one person? I dunno...

1. ここでキスして｡ (koko de KISS shite) [Kiss Me Here] - Shiina Ringo (椎名林檎) cover

2. やさしい気持ち (yasashii kimochi) [Gentle Feelings] - CHARA cover

3. A Perfect Sky - BONNIE PINK cover

4. 何度でも (nando demo) [No Matter How Many Times] - DREAMS COME TRUE cover

5. Story - AI cover

6. つつみ込むように… (tsutsumi komu youni) [Like Being Wrapped Up...] - MISIA cover

7. 三日月 (mikka-zuki) [Crescent Moon] - Ayaka (綾香) cover

8. GIRL TALK - Amuro Namie (安室奈美恵） cover

9. PRIDE - Imai Miki (今井美紀) cover

10. RIDE ON TIME - Yamashita Tatsuro (山下達郎) cover

Enjoy!

diary

VA - Anison Joshibu (Anison女子部)

Hey did you ever watch Marmalade Boy? Well... I didn't. And now I'm too old to sit through a shojo romance anime anymore... agh.

This was another of my recent purchases, and I didn't notice till after I ordered that nearly ALL the songs on here are from Marmalade Boy! I was ready to be disappointed, because I wouldn't be able to fully enjoy/relate to the songs.

However, it wasn't a complete loss! Far from it. You should get this CD just because of the AWESOME kick-ass Latin-flavored rendition of the Sailor Moon theme song!!!!! Also, Track 3 is a great dancy number. My fav track of the album.

The three artists featured on this CD are pretty obscure... couldn't find ANYTHING on eni (due to the fact the stage name is just too vague to research), Hasuki Sayaka seems to have been in some CMs and is part of a music group, and Komatsu Ran is an up-and-coming singer in the Tokyo area, currently playing live events around town.

1. 笑顔に会いたい (egao ni aitai) from MARMALADE BOY (ママレードボーイ) by Hasuki Sayaka (蓮木さやか)

2. ムーンライト伝説 (MOONLIGHT densetsu) from SAILOR MOON (セーラームーン) by Komatsu Ran (小松らん)

3. MOMENT from MARMALADE BOY (ママレードボーイ) by eni

4. Melody～抱きしめて～ (~dakishimete~) from MARMALADE BOY (ママレードボーイ) by Hasuki Sayaka (蓮木さやか)

5. 最後の約束 (saigo no yakusoku) from MARMALADE BOY (ママレードボーイ) by Hasuki Sayaka (蓮木さやか)

6. ミラクル・ガール (MIRACLE GIRL) from YAWARA by Komatsu Ran (小松らん)

7. SOUTH WIND from MARMALADE BOY (ママレードボーイ) by Komatsu Ran (小松らん)

8. 天使のゆびきり (tenshi no yubikiri) from Kareshi Kanojo no Jijou (彼氏彼女の事情) by Komatsu Ran (小松らん)

9. エンジェル (ANGEL) from MARMALADE BOY (ママレードボーイ) by Komatsu Ran (小松らん)

10. 素敵な小夜曲(セレナーデ) (suteki na SERENADE) from MARMALADE BOY (ママレードボーイ) by eni

11. そばにいたい (soba ni itai) from MARMALADE BOY (ママレードボーイ) by Hasuki Sayaka (蓮木さやか)

12. DON'T YOU KNOW?! from Go-kinjo Monogatari (ご近所物語) by Komatsu Ran (小松らん)

13. ヒ・ロ・イ・ン (HEROINE) from Go-kinjo Monogatari (ご近所物語) by Komatsu Ran (小松らん)

14. Rain from MARMALADE BOY (ママレードボーイ) by Komatsu Ran (小松らん)

Enjoy!

Anison Joshibu

VA - Majokko DISCO (魔女っ子DISCO)

Yay! I got some stuff in the mail~~~ and I wanna share! Fun! >_<

This is something I've wanted for a while, upbeat covers of magical girl anime openings/endings (mostly from Studio Pierrot)! It's not disco genre music, more electro/house, but it's fun!

The singers are nearly alllllll lesser known seiyuu (at least from what I researched), and I think some are ero-game seiyuu....!

But, they are auto-tuned enough to have ok voices. I'm more into the beat with this one! It's a nice take on songs that you may be familiar with (and if you downloaded my previous post for Kira Kira Majokko Cluv, you will definitely like this one).

It goes OP, then ED, so I will only list anime title once.

1. デリケートに好きして (DELICATE ni sukishite) from Mahou no Tenshi CREAMY MAMI (魔法の天使クリィーミーマミ) by Mizuno Manabi (水野愛日)

2. LOVEさりげなく (sarigenaku) by Itou Mai (伊藤麻衣)

3. ラブ・ラブ・ミンキーモモ (LOVE LOVE MINKY MOMO) from Mahou no PRINCESS MINKY MOMO (魔法のプリンセスミンキーモモ) by Kamonomiya Yuu (鴨ノ宮ゆう)

4. ミンキーステッキドリミンパ (MINKI STICK DORIMINPA) by Kuwakado Sora (桑門そら)

5. 見知らぬ国のトリッパー (mishiranu kuni no TRIPPER) from Mahou no Yousei PERSIA (魔法の妖精ペルシャ) by Fujimori Yukina (藤森ゆき奈)

6. ラブリードリーム (LOVELY DREAM) by Mizuno Manabi (水野愛日)

7. 不思議色ハピネス (fushigi-iro HAPPINESS) from Mahou no STAR MAGICAL EMI (魔法のスターマジカルエミ) by Maki Midori (真木 碧)

8. あなただけ Dreaming (anata dake) by Fujisaki Kaori (藤咲かおり)

9. 金のリボンでRockして (kin no RIBBON de ROCK shite) from Mahou no IDOL PASTEL YUMI (魔法のアイドルパステルユーミ) by Abe Reiko (阿部玲子)

10. フリージアの少年 (FREESIA no shonen) by Asaki Risa (朝樹りさ)

11. 魔女っ子メグちゃん (majokko MEG-chan) by naomi

12. ひとりぼっちのメグ (hitori-bocchi no MEG) by naomi

Enjoy!

Majokko DISCO

Flower Rouge - Memories Bossa Spring Summer Side

Hi guys! Gonna try to keep up and posting even if I don't feel like it... to tell you the truth sometimes I just don't know what to upload, and I actually sit and think about it a while... I want to be diverse, ya know?

This is part of a series of Seiko Matsuda bossa nova-ish cover albums. I'm trying to get my hands on more of them, because who doesn't want more Seiko covers!? I love them! Fun, cute, light-hearted...and I love the album covers with that little girl! Love her hair!

1. 裸足の季節 (hadashi no kisetsu) [Barefoot Season]

2. 青い珊瑚礁 (aoi sangosho) [Blue Reef]

3. チェリーブラッサム (CHERRY BLOSSOM)

4. 夏の扉 (natsu no tobira) [Summer Door]

5. 渚のバルコニー (nagisa no BALCONY) [Sea-side Balcony]

6. 小麦色のマーメイド (komugi-iro no MERMAID) [Tan Mermaid]

7. 天使のウィンク (tenshi no WINK) [Angel's Wink]

8. 秘密の花園 (himitsu no hanazono) [Secret Garden]

9. 天国のキッス (tengoku no KISS) [Kiss of Heaven]

10. Rock'n Rouge

Enjoy!

Memories Bossa

VA - Utau LOVE PLUS (歌うラブプラス)

Hey guysssss long time no see again... school started for me and I had a busy week at work, so I am EXHAUSTED. Plus, my iPod is almost FULL! I have to buy a new one, so I have to control myself. >_<

I came across this album and wanted to share it, because I thought it was so interesting that a modern dating sim game has the characters singing such old songs! These are the girls from Love Plus, and you may have heard of it outside of Japan because a college student actually "married" one of the girls (the one on the far right in the pic).

Anyway, typical seiyuu quality singing (i.e. they aren't the BEST singers, but they are cutesy), most famous of the three being Sakura Tange.

I don't know much about this album, it's not on amazon. Hmm. Anyway, track 10 was original, so if you feel like hunting down this album to hear it, go right ahead!

1. TOMORROW by Hayami Saori (早見沙織) - Okamoto Maya (岡本真夜) cover

2. そばかす (sobakasu) [Freckles] by Tange Sakura (丹下 桜) - JUDY AND MARY cover

3. MUGO・ん...色っぽい (mugon...iroppoi) [Speechless...Sexy] by Minaguchi Yuko (皆口裕子) - Kudou Shizuka (工藤静香) cover

4. ラムのラブソング (LUM no LOVE SONG) [Lum's Love Song] by Hayami Saori (早見沙織) - from Urusei Yatsura (うる星やつら)

5. デリケートに好きして (DELICATE ni sukishite) [Like it Delicate] by Tange Sakura (丹下 桜) - from Magical Angel CREAMY MAMI (魔法の天使クリィミーマミ)

6. 私がオバさんになっても (watashi ga OBA-san ni nattemo) [Even If I Become Middle Aged] by Minaguchi Yuko (皆口裕子) - Moritaka Chisato (森高千里) cover

7. 淋しい熱帯魚 (sabishii nettaigyo) [Lonely Tropical Fish] by Hayami Saori (早見沙織) & Minaguchi Yuko (皆口裕子) - Wink cover

8. アジアの純真 (ASIA no junshin) [Pure Asia] by Hayami Saori (早見沙織) & Tange Sakura (丹下 桜) - PUFFY cover

9. 渚のシンドバッド (nagisa no SINDBAD) [Shore-side Sindbad] by Tange Sakura (丹下 桜) & Minaguchi Yuko (皆口裕子) - PINK LADY (ピンク・レディー) cover

Enjoy!

Utau Love Plus

LoveforMee - Sweets Pop J-POP COVERS ～四季のウタ～

This album is a compilation of covers by LOVE (c) and ForMee, together known as LoveforMee. They were featured on the J-pop Cover Densetsu series. I think they are models first and singers second, which seems to be a trend nowadays...

I won't be including track 1 because first of all, it's a mash-up intro, so I guess I consider it an "original" track; secondly, I myself hate mash-up intros to non-stop mixes, and I don't even include them in my iTunes library when I burn the CD... so, if you want a complete album, please buy it @ amazon.co.jp

2. 今夜はブギー・バック (nice vocal) (konya ha BOOGIE BACK) [Tonight is Boogie Back] - Ozawa Kenji & SUCHADA RAPPER (小沢健二 & スチャダラパー) cover

3. キセキ (KISEKI) [Miracle] - GReeeeN cover

4. 恋におちたら (koi ni ochitara) [If I Fall in Love] - Crystal Kay cover

5. フユラブ (FUYU LOVE) [Winter Love] - Juliet cover

6. CHOO CHOO TRAIN - ZOO cover

8. 亜麻色の髪の乙女 (ama-iro no kami no otome) [Flaxen-haired Maiden] - VILLAGE SINGERS (ヴィレッジ・シンガーズ) cover

9. Point of No Return - CHEMISTRY cover

10. 空も飛べるはず (sora mo toberu hazu) [Should Fly in the Sky] - SPITZ (スピッツ) cover

11. チェリー (CHERRY) - SPITZ (スピッツ) cover

12. 虹 (niji) [Rainbow] - Aqua Timez cover

13. Secret Base - ZONE cover

14. クリスマス・イブ (CHRISTMAS EVE) - Yamashita Tatsuro (山下達郎) cover

15. サクラサク (SAKURA SAKU) [Cherry Blossoms Bloom] - Kitano Kii (北乃きい) cover

16. 桜坂 (sakura-zaka) [Cherry Blossom Hill] - Fukuyama Masaharu (福山雅治) cover

17. 夏の日の1993 (natsu no hi no 1993) [Summer Day 1993] - class cover

18. ナツラブ (NATSU LOVE) [Summer Love] - Juliet cover

19. 桜 (sakura) [Cherry Blossoms] - FUNKY MONKEY BABYS cover

20. 遥か (haruka) [Far Away] - GReeeeN cover

21. 瞳をとじて (hitomi wo tojite) [Close Your Eyes] - Hirai Ken (平井 堅) cover

22. 雪の華 (yuki no hana) [Snow Flower] - Nakashima Mika (中島美嘉) cover

23. Everything - MISIA cover

I'm not sure how to translate Track 10...anyway

Enjoy!

LoveforMee - shiki no uta

Part 5

Minami Saori (南沙織) - Covers 1971-1974 Post 1

Saori Minami, also known as Cynthia, was an early 70s idol (1971-1978). She is best known for her biggest hit and debut single, "17" (１７才), which was covered and became a late 80s hit for another idol.

She made a lot of covers in English and Japanese, of recent hits (at the time), or 60s hits. Her English is very good, and her singing voice is mature and lyrical.

I'm splitting this up into 5 parts, in two posts; so the dl link will be at the bottom of all the lists! Ok!

Check her out @ amazon.co.jp!

Part 1:

1. オー・シャンゼリゼ -LES CHAMPS-ELYSEES- : Joe Dassin cover

2. サマー・クリエーション -SUMMER CREATION- : Joan Sheppard cover

3. ジョージー・ガール -GEORGY GIRL- : The Seekers cover

4. そよ風にのって (soyokaze ni notte) [Ride The Breeze] -DAN LE MEME WAGON- : Marjorie Noel cover

5. ハロー・リバプール -LIVERPOOL HELLO- : Capricorn cover

6. ビー・マイ・ベイビー -BE MY BABY- : The Ronettes cover

7. ラブ・チャイルド -LOVE CHILD- : Diana Ross & the Supremes cover

8. ローズ・ガーデン -ROSE GARDEN- : Lynn Anderson cover

9. 先生のお気に入り (sensei no okini-iri) -TEACHER'S PET- : Doris Day cover

10. 夢みるシャンソン人形 (yume miru CHANSON ningyo) [Dreaming Chanson Doll] -POUPEE DE CIRE, POUPEE DE SON- : France Gall cover

Part 2:

1. 小さな恋のメロディ (chiisana koi no MELODY) [Small Love Melody] -MELODY FAIR- : The Beegees cover

2. 小さな願い (chiisana negai) -I SAY A LITTLE PRAYER- : Aretha Franklin cover

3. 悲しき天使 (kanashiki tenshi) [Sad Angel] -THOSE WERE THE DAYS- : Mary Hopkin cover

4. 悲しき片想い (kanashiki kata-omoi) [Sad Crush] -YOU DON'T KNOW- : Helen Shapiro cover

5. 雨 (ame) [Rain] -LA PIOGGIA- : Gigliola Cinquetti cover

6. 雨の御堂筋 (ame no midousuji) [Rainy Midousuji] : Ou Yang Fei Fei (欧陽菲菲)

cover

7. アイル・ビー・ゼア -I'LL BE THERE- : Jackson5 cover

romi - ano uta (あのうた)

Yikes! So sorry for not updating. First, I kinda was thinking what to upload next, because my blog is kinda all over the place. Then I got really sick last weekend, and then I got kinda melancholy, and then depressed.............

But now I'm back! I'll try to be more happy. I haven't listened to music too much lately, maybe that's it!? ^_~

This is an album I just bought recently, really cute bossa nova-ish covers of anime songs. They are a bit more upbeat for a bossa nova genre, but still super fun, and I love love love Track 8!!!!

Here she is on amazon.jp. Gonna try to get my hands on her second part of this. Apparently on her label's home page here you can request songs she sings (e-mail and form is in Japanese only though)... hopefully there will be a third one from her too!

Ohki Risa (大木理沙) - Final Fantasy Vocal Collection: PRAY

Released way back in 1994. Absolutely fabulous covers of FF themes ranging from 1 to 6. Ohki Risa's voice is slightly operatic, but very versatile, and she sings in French, English, Portuguese as well!

I'd recommend almost all the songs on here (Track 5 is probably the BEST rendition of "Theme of Love" from FF4 ever made). I've been listening to this since I was a kid (and have been playing FF for just as long!), so this album is very dear to me.

It was re-released for it's 10th anniversary in 2004! It was long out of print before that. Pray @ amazon.co.jp

1. Prelude - Final Fantasy Main Theme

2. The Promised Land - Main Theme from Final Fantasy 2

3. Mon P'tit Chat (My Little Cat) - "Music Box Memories" from Final Fantasy 5

4. 時の放浪者 (toki no hourousha) [Wanderer of Time] - "Tina/Terra's Theme" from Final Fantasy 6

5. 光の中へ (hikari no naka e) [Into The Light] - "Theme of Love" from Final Fantasy 4

6. Esperança do Amor (Hope of Love) - "Dear Friends" from Final Fantasy 5

7. Voyage - "Boundless Ocean" from Final Fantasy 3

8. Au Palais de Verre (In The Glass Palace) - "Matoya's Cave" from Final Fantasy 1

9. Once You Meet Her - "Water Priestess Aria" from Final Fantasy 3

10. Pray - Final Fantasy Main Theme

11. Não Chora Meniña (Don't Cry Little Girl) - "Kids Run Through The City Corner" from Final Fantasy 6

Enjoy!

PRAY

I have been putting this on at work, and it really changes my mood. Have cherry blossom time all year round with this one! Buy it here. Also, you can find the individual artists from the amazon page. VA - Yamaguchi Momoe Tribute Thank You For... part 2

Here is part 2 of the Momoe Yamaguchi (山口百恵) tribute album. Buy it here: Thank You For @ amazon.co.jp

This one is not so amazing as the first one (judging from the reception it's gotten on amazon reviews), but I think the collection of artists is more eclectic sounding and is a nice angle to take on Momoe from. Of note is the rarely covered "chipokke na kansho", acapella covered "Yokosuka Story", and heavy metal take on "Imitation Gold". A great addition to any Momoe fan's collection if you ask me!

Billie Hughes is kinda obscure to me, so if anyone has any info on him that'd be great...

And just who are the Windham Hill Artists!? Other than a Japanese website (which is pretty bare), I can't find anything on them! I don't even know if the title of their song is the right one.

Wink Covers Part 3

Gotta get these Wink cover collections up and finished for you! No, I'm not trying to get Wink out of the way, what are you Saying!? They truly were the Queens of Covers, and they did it right: they totally owned their own lyrics and sound. I've heard (and will upload) some pretty lukewarm covers; covers can go horribly wrong if they aren't handled like an individual's song, IMO.

VA - Yamaguchi Momoe Tribute Thank You For...

The great Momoe Yamaguchi (山口百恵) started out in 1973 as a 70s idol and by her late teens had successfully transitioned to an utahime, or "song princess", the Japanese equivalent of diva.

While not having many number one hits, the combination of her mature beauty, sultry voice, and mystique has captivated singers and fans alike for 30+ years.

Retiring in 1980 at the age of 20 to marry fellow actor Tomokazu Miura (三浦友和), she has never come back into public life; fans, including me, still dream of a comeback someday.

In the meantime, her two sons are in showbiz, the oldest as the lead singer of now defunct band PEAKY SALT, and the younger just starting to act in movies.

Luckily for us, she is one of the most covered artists, and her later singles have become classics in Japanese culture.

Momoe Tribute @ amazon.co.jp

1. ロックンロール・ウィドウ (ROCK 'N ROLL WIDOW) by Fujii FUMIYA (藤井フミヤ)

The singers are all idol-type artists (ex Morning Musume Ai Kago (加護亜依) for example), gravia idols, models, and the remixers are all pretty recent right now, on this electro-themed wave that's been happening in pop music.

Wink Covers Part 2

Wink Covers Part 1

Wink was a late 80s early 90s pop duo, with nearly half of their work being covers, from obscure Euro 80s hits to oldies. While their first single, "Sugar Baby Love" was a cover, they didn't get put on the map until their 3rd single, a cover of Kylie Minogue's "Turn It Into Love" which had just come out the same year.

Consisting of Shoko Aida (相田翔子) and Sachiko Suzuki (鈴木早智子), they lasted till 1996 and had to quit from failing sales. They were really a product of late 80s idol groups and I guess couldn't keep up with the times.

While Shoko is still on talk shows and acting, Sachiko has had a bit of scandal with releasing a soft porn movie and cheating with a married actor! But... check out their Wink work... ahem... Wink @ amazon.co.jp

Included in part 1 of my Wink cover selection (sorry, I don't have all their albums... yet! There are more covers out there! I want them too! >_< )

1. BYE BYE BABY - The Four Seasons cover

2. DANCE WITH ME - Orleans cover

3. DING DING 〜恋から始まるふたりのトレイン〜 (~koi kara hajimaru futari no TRAIN~) [Our Train Starting From Love] - Annika Burman's "I en ding ding värld" cover

4. NAVY BLUE - Diane Renay cover

5. Sugar Baby Love - Rubettes cover

6. 愛が止まらない ～Turn It Into Love～ (ai ga tomaranai) [Love Doesn't Stop] - Kylie Minogue cover

7. Baby Me - Holly Knight cover

8. Especially For You ～優しさにつつまれて～ (~yasashisa ni tsutsumarete~) [Wrap Me In Tenderness] - Kylie Minogue & Jason Donovan cover

9. IN YOUR LETTER - REO Speedwagon cover

10. JOANNA - Kool & the Gang cover

11. OH MY LOVE - John Lennon cover

Enjoy!
